verses.name: Job 29:1
verses.text: Moreover Job continued his parable, and said,

verses.name: Job 29:2
verses.text: Oh that I were as in months past, as in the days when God preserved me;

verses.name: Job 29:3
verses.text: When his candle shined upon my head, and when by his light I walked through darkness;

verses.name: Job 29:4
verses.text: As I was in the days of my youth, when the secret of God was upon my tabernacle;

verses.name: Job 29:5
verses.text: When the Almighty was yet with me, when my children were about me;

verses.name: Job 29:6
verses.text: When I washed my steps with butter, and the rock poured me out rivers of oil;
